title: Ep. 616 - My Man Mitt
description:
Romney vows not to block Trump’s SCOTUS pick, Trump makes the most serious recognition of national rot since the 1850s, and the MSM get caught in a major lie about Supreme Court frontrunner Amy Coney Barrett.
